security: This record does not contain any information that would cause damage to national security. Therefore, there are no security concerns with the release of this record.
summary: A letter from an unknown sender to 'J' regarding Jack Rubenstein, stating that a Jack Rubenstein arrived in Israel in 1962, born in Poland in 1905, residing in New York, arriving May 17 and departing June 7 with his wife Mimi.
summary_one_paragraph: This letter, dated December 2, 1963, addresses 'J' from an unidentified sender (referenced as 'starostl') in response to a request about Jack Rubenstein. It reports that the only Jack Rubenstein known to have arrived in Israel during 1962 was a Polish native born in 1905 and residing in New York, who visited Israel with his wife Mimi from May 17 to June 7.
title: Subject: Jack RUBENSTEIN
